snippet: The German rock band Tangerine Dream is synonymous with a period of moviemaking. Some classics of the period are being shown at BAMcinématek.
abstract: BAMcinematek is showing a series of films drawn from the 30-plus movie collaborations with scores by the German rock band Tangerine Dream, synonymous with a period of filmmaking in the 1980s when synthesizers were the sonic wallpaper of film soundtracks.
lead_paragraph: The German rock band Tangerine Dream is synonymous with a period of moviemaking. Some classics of the period are being shown at BAMcinématek.

headline.seo: Tangerine Dream’s Music in BAMcinématek Series
headline.main: Underscoring the Drama in the Dark
headline.print_headline: Underscoring The Drama In the Dark
